channel.title: [PI] Changing a NPC's Hitpoints [PI]
channel.description: Here is my NPC.cfg with the "layout?" it's supposed to be in. I've compiled, saved, restarted, all that good stuff but the hp just won't change.. [code=java] // NpcID NpcName combat health npc = 8528 Nomad 699 30000[/code]

item.title: [PI] Changing a NPC's Hitpoints [PI]
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

Here is my NPC.cfg with the “layout?” it’s supposed to be in. I’ve compiled, saved, restarted, all that good stuff but the hp just won’t change…

// NpcID NpcName combat health npc = 8528 Nomad 699 30000

Read full topic
